text: But He forbade/prohibited on you animals whose death was caused by suffocation or strangulation/dead, and the blood, and the pig`s/swine`s meat/flesh, and what is praised/declared to whom the sacrifice was made with it to other than God, so who was forced, not transgressing/corrupting , and nor transgressing/violating , so no sin/crime on him, that God (is) forgiving , most merciful
